name: AMG
comment: An early-1990s archival/compression program for DOS - http://fileformats.archiveteam.org/wiki/AMG_(compressed_archive)

pack.cmdline: dosbox -noconsole -c "mount d $tools" -c "mount e $(pwd)" -c "e:" -c "d:amgc a e:0.amg e:0" -c "exit"

unpack.cmdline: $tool -noconsole -c "mount d $tools" -c "mount E $destdir" -c "mount f $arcloc" -c "D:amgc e f:$shortname E:" -c "exit"
